summary: A new police officer wants to meet up with somebody in an abandoned fort in the woods. What he doesn't know is that the place also serves as a meeting point for a group of hunters - whose prey aren't animals.
cast: Steven Waddington|Tony Becker|Dianna Agron|Chris Briant|Terence Knox|Jay Brown|Xavier Delambre|Philip Correia|Laurent Barbier|Philippe Beauvais|Dean Gregory|Thomas Sanne|Daniel Plier|Caroline Espargilière|Claire Johnston|Sascha Ley|Sascha Migge|Gintare Parulyte|Laurence Rexter-Baker|Loreta Fishta|Alex Adam|Isabelle Constantini|Jean-François Wolff|Mireille De Kerleau|Christophe Carassou|Corinne Pilutti|Patrice Diou|Stéphanie Siebering|Sophie Pop|Erwan Cloitre|Marco Viscera|Francois-Xavier Diou|Sydney Kralejevic|Eric Lobry|André Huet|Micha Mann|Sergio Kato|Philippe Perrin
keywords: most dangerous game|two word title|hunting|human hunting a human|human hunted down for sport
title: The Hunters
